name: Chicken Wrap
description: Delicious and satisfying wrap with fresh vegetables, grilled chicken, and creamy sauce. Perfect for lunch or light dinner.

instructions.instruction: Marinate chicken slices with paprika, cumin, half the salt and pepper.
Make sauce by mixing Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, garlic, lemon juice, and remaining salt.
Heat pan over medium-high heat, add olive oil.
Cook chicken slices, 4-5 minutes per side.
instructions.tip: Don't stir too much, let it get nice color.

instructions.instruction: Warm tortillas in dry pan or microwave for 20 seconds.
Spread 2 tbsp sauce in center of each tortilla.
Layer lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion.
Place cooked chicken slices on top of vegetables.
Fold bottom of tortilla up, then roll from sides.
instructions.tip: Roll tightly so ingredients don't fall out.

tips: Marinating chicken ahead makes it more flavorful.
Sauce can be prepared ahead and refrigerated.
Use whole wheat tortillas to increase fiber.
storageInfo: Unwrapped ingredients can be stored separately for 2 days. Consume immediately after wrapping.
servingSuggestion: Serve with fries or fresh salad on the side.
variations: Spicy version: Add sriracha or hot sauce.
Greek style: Add feta cheese and olives.
Mexican style: Add beans and corn.
